description: DNS query to youtu.be marked as high entropy, which can indicate use of DNS tunneling to exfiltrate data or maintain C2 channels.
anomaly: {"AnalysisComponent": {"AnalysisComponentIdentifier": 30, "AnalysisComponentType": "EntropyDetector", "AnalysisComponentName": "AMiner: High entropy in DNS domain.", "Message": "Value entropy anomaly detected", "PersistenceFileName": "entropy_dns_domain", "TrainingMode": false, "AffectedLogAtomPaths": ["/model/type/query/domain", "/model/type/reply/domain", "/model/type/forwarded/domain"], "AffectedLogAtomValues": ["youtu.be"], "CriticalValue": 0.014938108374387008, "ProbabilityThreshold": 0.015}, "LogData": {"RawLogData": ["Jan 17 09:26:33 dnsmasq[14460]: query[A] youtu.be from 192.168.128.4"], "Timestamps": [1642411593], "DetectionTimestamp": [1642411593], "LogLinesCount": 1, "LogResources": ["/var/log/dnsmasq.log"]}, "AMiner": {"ID": "192.168.255.254"}}
